languages.text: Попытка возродить заброшенную колонию в Ничейных мирах не увенчалась успехом — связь с кораблем колонистов была потеряна, как только тот прибыл в систему. Стоит выяснить, что случилось с судном.

traits.locale_text: Попытка возродить заброшенную колонию в Ничейных мирах не увенчалась успехом — связь с кораблем колонистов была потеряна, как только тот прибыл в систему. Стоит выяснить, что случилось с судном.

languages.text: There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.
languages.original_text: Попытка возродить заброшенную колонию в Ничейных мирах не увенчалась успехом — связь с кораблем колонистов была потеряна, как только тот прибыл в систему. Стоит выяснить, что случилось с судном.

traits.locale_text: There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.

There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.

There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.

There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.

languages.text: Un vaisseau de colons a disparu peu après son arrivée dans le système de Mundus Nullius, où il avait pour mission de restaurer une colonie abandonnée. Il pourrait être intéressant d'enquêter sur son sort.
languages.original_text: There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.

traits.locale_text: Un vaisseau de colons a disparu peu après son arrivée dans le système de Mundus Nullius, où il avait pour mission de restaurer une colonie abandonnée. Il pourrait être intéressant d'enquêter sur son sort.

languages.text: 一群殖民者打算恢复纽鲁斯领被遗弃的殖民地，但他们却遭遇了不幸的命运，他们的殖民飞船抵达这颗行星不久之后就失去了联系。这艘飞船的遭遇或许值得调查一番。
languages.original_text: There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.

traits.locale_text: 一群殖民者打算恢复蒙杜斯·纽鲁斯被遗弃的殖民地，但他们却遭遇了不幸的命运，他们的殖民飞船抵达这颗行星不久之后就失去了联系。这艘飞船的遭遇或许值得调查一番。

languages.text: ムンドゥス・ヌリウスに捨て去られたコロニーを復活させようという試みは失敗に終わり、入植者の船は星系に到着後、程なくして停止してしまった。この船の運命は調査する価値があるかもしれない。
languages.original_text: There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.

traits.locale_text: ムンドゥス・ヌリウスに捨て去られたコロニーを復活させようという試みは失敗に終わり、入植者の船は星系に到着後、程なくして停止してしまった。この船の運命は調査する価値があるかもしれない。

languages.text: Es gab einen erfolglosen Versuch, eine verlassene Kolonie im Mundus Nullius wiederaufzubauen. Der Kontakt zu dem Kolonistenschiff brach kurz nach dessen Ankunft im System ab. Vielleicht sollte man nachforschen, was aus dem Schiff geworden ist.
languages.original_text: There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.

traits.locale_text: Es gab einen erfolglosen Versuch, eine verlassene Kolonie im Mundus Nullius wiederaufzubauen. Der Kontakt zu dem Kolonistenschiff brach kurz nach dessen Ankunft im System ab. Vielleicht sollte man nachforschen, was aus dem Schiff geworden ist.

languages.text: Se ha producido un intento fallido de restaurar una colonia abandonada en Mundus Nullius. La nave de colonos perdió el contacto tras llegar al sistema. Podría ser buena idea investigar el sino de la nave.
languages.original_text: There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.

traits.locale_text: Se ha producido un intento fallido de restaurar una colonia abandonada en Mundus Nullius. La nave de colonos perdió el contacto tras llegar al sistema. Podría ser buena idea investigar el sino de la nave.

languages.text: Mundus Nullius'taki terk edilmiş bir koloniyi yeniden ayağa kaldırmak adına başarısız bir teşebbüste bulunulmuş. Sisteme ulaştıktan kısa bir süre sonra kolonicileri taşıyan gemiyle iletişim kopmuş. Gemiye ne olduğu araştırılmaya değer olabilir.
languages.original_text: There has been an unsuccessful attempt to restore an abandoned colony in the Mundus Nullius — the colonist ship went dark shortly after its arrival in the system. The vessel's fate could be worth investigating.
